title: Blood Mummy
summaries: Mummies are Hardmode Desert enemies. They spawn in areas where Sand Blocks are present and follow the Fighter AI (behaving similar to Zombies).
There are several different types of Mummies: Dark Mummies, Light Mummies, and (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Blood Mummies.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked> versions, they spawn in <linked>Corrupted Deserts</linked>, <linked>Hallowed Deserts</linked> and <linked>Crimson Deserts</linked>, respectively.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked> and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked> versions, the Dark Mummies can spawn in both Corrupted/Crimson Deserts.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console and 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] versions, there are other two exclusive types of Mummies: Shadow Mummies and Spectral Mummies, which spawn in Corrupted Deserts and Hallowed Deserts respectively.

Dark Mummies and Blood Mummies are 150% faster than other Mummies. All mummies receive a 200% speed increase when they are reduced to 50% health or lower. In addition, mummies inflict the following <linked>debuffs</linked>:

• Regular Mummies: Slow
  • Dark Mummies/Blood Mummies/Shadow Mummies: Silenced, Darkness
  • Light Mummies/Spectral Mummies: Confused
